titleStmt.title: The actes of Englysh votaryes comprehendynge their vnchast practyses and examples by all ages, from the worldes begynnynge to thys present yeare, collected out of their owne legendes and chronycles by Iohan Bale. ...
Acts of English votaries. Part 1
titleStmt.author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.

publicationStmt.date: in the yeare of our Lorde God. 1.5.4.6]

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; actual printer's name and address from STC.
The printing has been erroneously attributed to John Day and to Richard Jugge.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
